name: .2074//A Virtual Sabaatical
description:
Currently not playable on phones, only PCs.

Welcome to "The World"... or is it? Play this brand new narrative game set inspired by the dot hack universe. It's an episodic narrative game about the future of VR, generational trauma with technology, and being at the worst point in your life and desperately wanting an escape.

Robin Staylin has had a terrible year and at the end of all of it she's found she's just tired of reality. Her only solace since she was a kid has been the world's most popular MMORPG, Gintree Universe Online, which has a service to merge its users' consciousness into the world of the game for a period of time. Still, even in another world, the reality of leaving her family and the death of her brother can't seem to leave her mind.
